text: Pokrovka () is a rural locality (a selo) in Kuganaksky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 843 as of 2010. == Geography == It is located 30 km from Sterlitamak, 7 km from Bolshoy Kuganak. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Pokrovka, Kuganaksky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
